articles.author: Megan Henney
articles.title: Americans expect high inflation to stick around in latest NY Fed survey - Fox Business
articles.description: A New York Federal Reserve survey published on Monday found that many American consumers expect inflation to remain abnormally high in the coming years.
articles.content:
Americans are bracing for high inflation to stick around over the next few years, according to a key Federal Reserve Bank of New York survey published Monday.
